name: Melrose Academy of the Arcane
description:
Your Future Calls


At the Melrose Academy of the Arcane, you will be more productive than you have ever been while also discovering all the wonders the school has to offer.

Your Time at Melrose


While you launch the experience, you can track your time as you're being productive by visiting the libraries and join one of the 25-minute work / 5-minute break online sessions.

A Place to Call Home


At Melrose, you'll be assigned a house that best fits your personality. There, you will find a rich history of magic users like yourself and create rich bonds. Our house dormitories and common rooms are a great place to make last friendships and share your successes.

Students from Around the Realm


Melrose has attracted students from all around the realm allowing you to meet people from the furthest reaches. While studying at Melrose you won't be alone. All around you will be others, also working towards their goals giving you the motivation to carry on.

A Growing School


We are committed to continuing to grow the academy so that you will continue to have the best resources available. This includes new areas to study in (gardens, markets, new libraries), fun games to play during breaks (mini-games during breaks), and much more.
